DOC.brief_summary: This study demonstrate effect generic clopidogrel bisulfate ( Plavitor速 ) comparison original clopidogrel bisulfate ( Plavix速 ) patient acute coronary syndrome .
DOC.brief_title: Point-of-Care Measurements Platelet Inhibition After Clopidogrel Loading Patients With Acute Coronary Syndrome : Comparison Generic Clopidogrel Bisulfate ( Plavitor速 ) With Original Clopidogrel Bisulfate ( Plavix速 )
DOC.criteria: 1 . Patients unstable angina nonST elevation myocardial infarction 2 . Patients plan coronary angiography 3 . Age > 18 year , < 75 year 4 . Patients agree study protocol 1 . Recent treatment clopidogrel pletaal glycoprotein IIb/IIIa Rc antagonist 2 . Active bleeding ( peptic ulcer , trauma intracranial hemorrhage ) 3 . Allergy antiplatelet agent 4 . Bleeding diasthesis ( blood coagulation disorder , uncontrolled severe hypertension , history severe bleeding ) 5 . History drug abuse alcohol abuse 6 . ST elevation myocardial infarction 7 . Pregnancy 8 . Low platelet count ( < 100,000 /L ) abnormal result PT PTT 9 . Liver disease ( bilirubin > 2 mg/dL , AST ALT > 100 IU ) 10 . Renal failure ( Cr > 2.0 mg/dL ) 11 . Malignancy 12 . Proton pump inhibitor , NSAIDs statin ( except atorvastatin )
